testcase.name: 'Simple Form Demo' Page Tests â€º Validate that the 'Your Message' field displays the correct text.
testcase.system-out: ======== Test started! ======== Step # 1: Navigate to 'https://www.lambdatest.com/selenium-playground/'. Step # 2: Click the 'Simple Form Demo' hyperlink. Step # 3: Validate that the user is successfully navigated to the 'simple-form-demo' page. Step # 4: Enter 'Welcome to LambdaTest' into the 'Enter Message' text box. Step # 5: Click the 'Get Checked Value' button. Step # 6: Validate that the 'Your Message:' field displays 'Welcome to LambdaTest'. Step # 7: Close browser. ======== Test completed! ========
